name: Zero Kara no Mahjong: Mahjong Youchien Tamago-gumi 2
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Purchase this PS one® Classic and play it on both your PS3™ and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) systems!

This sequel to Zero Kara no Mahjong retains all the accessibility of its predecessor but greatly refines the experience.

Take lessons based on actual matches to help learn the correct mannerisms and etiquette involved in true mahjong games.

Once your lessons are done, you'll be armed with all the techniques needed to beat your friends in real life.

Unleash the mahjong master deep inside you!

Download this PS one® Classic today!

Transferring to a PSP® system from your PS3™ system:

You must have at least 185 MB free on your Memory Stick Duo™. Connect your PSP® system to your PS3™ system with a USB cable and switch your PSP® system to USB Mode. Highlight the game on the PS3™ XMB™, press the ? button and select Copy.

PC Store Customers:
Log into your PlayStation®Network account that you originally used to purchased the game. Then, download the game from your "Download List" in the PlayStation®Store onto your PS3™ system.

This title has been converted from the original PlayStation® disc to the PSP® and the PS3™ systems. Consequently, there may be times where the title plays differently from the PlayStation® disc version, or where some features may not function properly. This version does not support PlayStation® peripherals (controller, memory card, multitap, etc.), therefore functionalities such as multiplayer, versus, and co-op modes are not available.

Please Note: This game is a direct import from Japan and is displayed in its original Japanese language.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
